channel.title: [317] AllstarUria [317]
channel.description:
Hello Everyone,
Our names are DigiiMajor & Joon123 (montana247) ! most of you allstar players know who we are and what wheve done here . and guess what ? we just started a hole new epic allstar server with new awesome stuff . Have some FUN playing this Server and help us out grown much as possible . thank you .
***DOWNLOADLINKS***
http://up.ht/1C0yoQm
http://uppit.com/0dslf9g0d09y/allstar_beta_online_v1.rar
- Working dice system - Anti dupe - New areas - Viewinfo added ! - Elite Boss dagonnoth prime - Lottery System - 1B Ticket Shop - King Black Dragon - Tztok - Jad - Nechryael boss - Rares with Monkey's - Dice Area (only dice here) - Working mystery boxes ! - Working Caskets ! - Working Lamps "150k xp" - Random thieving - Random mining - Random farming - Maxhit calculation - client colours - Old Allstar - home - Old Allstar - Skills - 100% Playertitles !! - Working skillcape emotes ! - GSmini - Full Torva - Full Primal - Vesta Longsword - Staff of Light - Training zone for Combat ! - Barrows under Construction . - Restart Timer every 90min - Working boss specials ! - fully remake of skills ! - 2 skills are under construction (slayer & runecrafting) the other skills works fine ! more info check out the skills under ; Farming: There are now 7 diffrent paths.
Level 1 Bush - Example: Jangerberries, Dwellberries, Red Berries, White Berries, Poison Ivy & more Level 25 - Calquat Tree Level 45 - Cactus Level 53 - Herb Patch Level 66 - Allotment - Example: Onion, Sweetcorn, Strewberry & more! level 76 - Hops - Example : Hammerstone, Asgarnian, wildblood & more! level 91 - Bittercap mushroom
!! FARMING IS AUTO, NOT A CLICK SKILL LIKE IT WAS !!
All of them need 8 minutes to grow, But all of them have diffrent start timers. Like: Bush starts at 7min, Calguat at 6:45min, Cactus at 5min. (--> for example). Each patch the XP will increase alot since I think farming is abit of a pointless skill. If you are interested, try it yourself !
Pictures farming: [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/1pcx74.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/ve3jn.png[/img]
Mining: Mining was like one purple rock, well I've made it diffrent!
Copper ore - Level 1. Iron ore - level 15. Coal ore - level 30. Gold ore - level 40. Mithril ore - level 55. Adamantite ore - level 70. Runite ore - level 85.
Like farming, Mining is the same. Mining is also an auto skill, But there one diffrent. The 'resource' can be depleted by an amount of time (10 seconds - 1minute). If it's depleted NONE can mine from the ore.
Mining Place Picture: [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/zv1wl4.png[/img]
Woodcutting & Fletching & Firemaking:
Woodcutting is an easy skill, You just go to a tree and click on the tree, You'll AUTO chop off some wood from the tree. One diffrent is there, the tree will regrow with a random timer from 5 seconds up to 55 seconds and the timer is for all the trees the same. You DONT NEED AN AXE!!!
Level 1: normal tree Level 30: willow tree Level 45: Maple tree Level 75: Yew tree Level 91: Magic tree
If you go to another tree, You'll also receive more XP, But each tree has an other regrow timer, like I said before!
Fletching: You Need a knife for this skill. You just click: Knife(log) + log(Knife) = Shortbow or Longbow
GUIDE:
TYPE LOG =============== LEVEL ===================== SHORTBOW OR LONGBOW
Normal 1 SHORTBOW Normal 10 LONGBOW
Willow 30 SHORTBOW Willow 40 LONGBOW
Maple 50 SHORTBOW Maple 60 LONGBOW
Yew 70 SHORTBOW Yew 80 LONGBOW
Magic 85 SHORTBOW Magic 92 LONGBOW
Firemaking: You need a tinderbox + log than the fire will come:
TYPE LOG =============== LEVEL
Normal 1
Willow 30
Maple 50
Yew 70
Magic 85
Pictures: [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2ep7typ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/e283b.png[/img]
Cooking:
Cooking used to be a click food -> range = Cooked food and keep repeating this is the old source. Well I've changed that and now its fully working auto cooking
Level 1 - Shrimp Level 40 - Lobster Level 76 - Shark Level 88 - Sea turtle
Picture:
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2ymitrk.png[/img]
Fishing:
Fishing is now also an auto skill, You just click on the fishing spot and you'll receive the TYPE fish and XP. Each spot is diffrent and each spot will give diffrent xp, it depens on the type fish.
Level 1 - Shrimp Level 40 - Lobster Level 80 - Shark Level 94 - Sea turtle
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/29pxb37.png[/img]
Our nice new updated Herblore zone ! with randomdrops and randommessages ! Big thanks to Joon123 !
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/ezk2hf.png[/img]
Also some random Boss attacks and specials ! For example Jad down here !
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/1551dm1.png[/img]
Jad's max hit is 55 ! so have a great hunt for the firecape !
Dice system , which only can be used at the dice area !
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2ylo9vo.png[/img]
Rares Area with nice drops "partyhats" & cash !
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/99o2m8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/wak9ef.png[/img]
Our newest elite boss with awesome drops :
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2d2f11y.png[/img]
Latest update is our Viewinfo system !
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/27yuck7.png[/img]
Check your stats by simply type ::viewinfo ..
we hope you guys will enjoy the server !
Yours,
DigiiMajor JOON123

item.title: [317] AllstarUria [317]
item.dc:creator: @digimajor digimajor
item.description:
@digimajor wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:11, topic:550240”][quote author=digimajor link=topic=669152.msg4474748#msg4474748 date=1425067572]

Seems like it returned after a while.

EDIT: hopefully soon the home will include working shops where i can buy food.
I also didn’t get any starter but the items i was wearing on log-in.
[/quote] strange on the fact you didnt get any starter package , did you tryed the command ::starter ? and yeah youre right but we are updating shops in the new home there is already a food shop in ::home btw? we still have a lot of ideas in progress haha .

Says already got a starter package.
And for the food shop, no clue which NPC that would be there’s a skill shop and master chef has no shop.

Edit: Got myself a starter on a new account.[/quote] i checked your character file and it says and shows me that you already have the starterspackage in your bank , you gained like 500 monkfish and every rune kind 5000x so take a look at your bank it must be there .

Read full topic

item.title: [317] AllstarUria [317]
item.dc:creator: @digimajor digimajor
item.description:
@digimajor wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:6, topic:550240”][quote author=digimajor link=topic=669152.msg4474665#msg4474665 date=1425015355]

I’m a little confused on what you’re talking about some of these skills being an auto skill. Things like mining, fishing and so on are auto skills but without banking. You will get the fishes until either you run out of inventory space, the location of the spot moves to another one (more so for bots in this case), random event etc., but are you saying that when your inventory is full that it’ll bank etc.? I’m confused.
[/quote] what it means is : in first case you had to click everytime on the fishing spot , mining spot or thief stall . now you have to click one time on one of those spots till it disapears doesnt mean that it stops till you have a full bag ! (its just not like bots) sometimes you get one fish and the spot disappears and sometimes you get like 7 fish till the spot is gone , its just the real thing also not autobanking , you need to bank the items by yourself !!

Alright, that’s what I thought. And you don’t have to do that besides thieving (since you provided the example), fishing, mining and so on are all the same and are automatic as is until the spot disappears and so on. So not sure what you’re talking about here.[/quote] you need to see it for yourself , i think that youll know what i mean when you logged in and tryed it out

Read full topic

You will get the fishes until either you run out of inventory space, the location of the spot moves to another one (more so for bots in this case), random event etc., but are you saying that when your inventory is full that it’ll bank etc.? I’m confused.

(its just not like bots) sometimes you get one fish and the spot disappears and sometimes you get like 7 fish till the spot is gone , its just the real thing also not autobanking , you need to bank the items by yourself !![/quote]
Alright, that’s what I thought. And you don’t have to do that besides thieving (since you provided the example), fishing, mining and so on are all the same and are automatic as is until the spot disappears and so on. So not sure what you’re talking about here.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] AllstarUria [317]
item.dc:creator: @digimajor digimajor
item.description:
@digimajor wrote:

Hello Everyone,

Our names are DigiiMajor & Joon123 (montana247) !
most of you allstar players know who we are and what wheve done here .
and guess what ? we just started a hole new epic allstar server with new awesome stuff .
Have some FUN playing this Server and help us out grown much as possible .
thank you .

DOWNLOADLINKS

http://up.ht/1C0yoQm

http://uppit.com/0dslf9g0d09y/allstar_beta_online_v1.rar

  • Working dice system
  • Anti dupe
  • New areas
  • Viewinfo added !
  • Elite Boss dagonnoth prime
  • Lottery System
  • 1B Ticket Shop
  • King Black Dragon
  • Tztok - Jad
  • Nechryael boss
  • Rares with Monkey’s
  • Dice Area (only dice here)
  • Working mystery boxes !
  • Working Caskets !
  • Working Lamps “150k xp”
  • Random thieving
  • Random mining
  • Random farming
  • Maxhit calculation
  • client colours
  • Old Allstar - home
  • Old Allstar - Skills
  • 100% Playertitles !!
  • Working skillcape emotes !
  • GSmini
  • Full Torva
  • Full Primal
  • Vesta Longsword
  • Staff of Light
  • Training zone for Combat !
  • Barrows under Construction .
  • Restart Timer every 90min
  • Working boss specials !
  • fully remake of skills !
  • 2 skills are under construction (slayer & runecrafting) the other skills works fine !
    more info check out the skills under ;
    Farming:
    There are now 7 diffrent paths.

Level 1 Bush - Example: Jangerberries, Dwellberries, Red Berries, White Berries, Poison Ivy & more
Level 25 - Calquat Tree
Level 45 - Cactus
Level 53 - Herb Patch
Level 66 - Allotment - Example: Onion, Sweetcorn, Strewberry & more!
level 76 - Hops - Example : Hammerstone, Asgarnian, wildblood & more!
level 91 - Bittercap mushroom

!! FARMING IS AUTO, NOT A CLICK SKILL LIKE IT WAS !!

All of them need 8 minutes to grow, But all of them have diffrent start timers.
Like: Bush starts at 7min, Calguat at 6:45min, Cactus at 5min. (–> for example).
Each patch the XP will increase alot since I think farming is abit of a pointless skill.
If you are interested, try it yourself !

Pictures farming:

Mining:
Mining was like one purple rock, well I’ve made it diffrent!

Copper ore - Level 1.
Iron ore - level 15.
Coal ore - level 30.
Gold ore - level 40.
Mithril ore - level 55.
Adamantite ore - level 70.
Runite ore - level 85.

Like farming, Mining is the same.
Mining is also an auto skill, But there one diffrent.
The ‘resource’ can be depleted by an amount of time (10 seconds - 1minute).
If it’s depleted NONE can mine from the ore.

Mining Place Picture:

Woodcutting & Fletching & Firemaking:

Woodcutting is an easy skill, You just go to a tree and click on the tree, You’ll AUTO chop off some wood from the tree.
One diffrent is there, the tree will regrow with a random timer from 5 seconds up to 55 seconds and the timer is for all the trees the same.
You DONT NEED AN AXE!!!

Level 1: normal tree
Level 30: willow tree
Level 45: Maple tree
Level 75: Yew tree
Level 91: Magic tree

If you go to another tree, You’ll also receive more XP, But each tree has an other regrow timer, like I said before!

Fletching:
You Need a knife for this skill.
You just click: Knife(log) + log(Knife) = Shortbow or Longbow

GUIDE:

TYPE LOG =============== LEVEL ===================== SHORTBOW OR LONGBOW

Normal 1 SHORTBOW
Normal 10 LONGBOW

Willow 30 SHORTBOW
Willow 40 LONGBOW

Maple 50 SHORTBOW
Maple 60 LONGBOW

Yew 70 SHORTBOW
Yew 80 LONGBOW

Magic 85 SHORTBOW
Magic 92 LONGBOW

Firemaking:
You need a tinderbox + log than the fire will come:

TYPE LOG =============== LEVEL

Normal 1

Willow 30

Maple 50

Yew 70

Magic 85

Pictures:

Cooking:

Cooking used to be a click food -> range = Cooked food and keep repeating this is the old source.
Well I’ve changed that and now its fully working auto cooking

Level 1 - Shrimp
Level 40 - Lobster
Level 76 - Shark
Level 88 - Sea turtle

Picture:

Fishing:

Fishing is now also an auto skill, You just click on the fishing spot and you’ll receive the TYPE fish and XP.
Each spot is diffrent and each spot will give diffrent xp, it depens on the type fish.

Level 1 - Shrimp
Level 40 - Lobster
Level 80 - Shark
Level 94 - Sea turtle

Our nice new updated Herblore zone ! with randomdrops and randommessages !
Big thanks to Joon123 !

Also some random Boss attacks and specials ! For example Jad down here !

Jad’s max hit is 55 ! so have a great hunt for the firecape !

Dice system , which only can be used at the dice area !

Rares Area with nice drops “partyhats” & cash !


Our newest elite boss with awesome drops :

Latest update is our Viewinfo system !

Check your stats by simply type ::viewinfo …

we hope you guys will enjoy the server !

Yours,

DigiiMajor
JOON123

Read full topic
